root.name: Lost
root.description: OverviewNot to be confused with the subsequent Lost: Via Domus for major consoles, Lost: The Game is a videogame based off of the popular ABC TV show Lost, where a group of people survive a plane crash on a tropical island, which they believe to be deserted. However, the natives that already inhabit the island and the survivors themselves are the basis for a number of plot twists, giving the story its life.In the game, the player is a survivor of Oceanic Flight 815 who wakes with amnesia. He interacts with the major characters of the television series in an effort to find out who he was and what the island truly is. This game is played as a third-person adventure game.
